text: Extremely rude male cashier. He showed black face and was cold in his tone throughout the whole transaction. He has a "don't want to there attitude". So just don't be there! No need to show his displeasure and attitude to customers.

Staff by the name is Li Cheng Yi was super rude n unprofessional.  I was there to buy stuffs either did I scold him .out of sudden raise his voice at.me n wanted to challenge me . Critises customer n provoke cust in complaining up to the mgmt

I hope someone can really teach him wats the proper manner of handling a cust.  We shld respect each other n not by this way. Respect is earn not given . Luckily I have a witness with me by the name of mira who is there working tat witness the whole scenario.

This is the first time I am being turned away from purchase from Fairprice Express in SingHealth Tower. The reason is the machine  did not have change for $50 so is the cashier. The lady on duty (12.7.24 at 3.15pm) is unfriendly & appeared displeased when I wanted to pay for my purchases with a $50 dollar note. Not only she refused the business, she also continued to chat with her friend & ignored me. So I keep back the purchases to its rightful location & promised myself, not to go to this outlet anymore.

Prices there are Cheers price.
Paid 2.70 for pokka kyoho and peach tea while ntuc only charge 1.80.  They don't accept CHAS card too. Will not patronise this store again.
Outlet located lobby of OCH. In this ntuc there a polar kiosk for drinks and cakes
